entries: When the necromancer kills a creature that is neither a construct or undead with a spell of 1st level or higher, the necromancer regains hit points equal to twice the spellâ€™s level, or three times if it is a necromancy spell.

monster.languages: understands Abyssal and Draconic but cannot speak

trait.name: Rampage
entries: When it reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, the abyssal giant lizard can take a bonus action to make a bite attack against a different creature.

entries: Melee Weapon Attack: {@hit +5} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 8 ({@dice 1d10+3}) piercing plus 5 ({@dice 2d4}) poison damage.
